House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00425
FULL TITLE : AN ACT ESTABLISHING A NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL IN BARANGAY CONCEPCION DOS, IN THE SECOND DISTRICT, CITY OF MARIKINA, TO BE KNOWN AS SSS NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL, AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

      6. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2016-10-20
